api/JeremyAnsel.Media.An8.An8AlphaMode.h.keywords: Enum An8AlphaMode An alpha mode. Namespace : JeremyAnsel.Media.An8 Assembly : JeremyAnsel.Media.An8.dll Syntax public enum An8AlphaMode Fields Name Description Final The alpha component is used. Layer The alpha components are multiplied. None The alpha component is ignored.
